item.title: Skycoin Bounty Program 1
item.description: Updated August 30, 2017. Remove GIF bounties. Updated again August 29, 2017. Added translation bounties. Updated August 29, 2017. Added reddit activity bonus. Increased GIF bounty to 20. Updated September 3, 2017. Added French to translation bounties. Updated September 12, 2017. Increase infographics bounty reward to 30. Updated November 8, 2017. Graphics and video bounties are handled on a case-per-case basis in the bounty channel. Update December 7, 2017. Add PortuguÃªs
